svg.title: CE-12: Code Evolution Quality Gates Checkpoint System
svg.desc: Complex quality validation system providing systematic checkpoints throughout code evolution process, ensuring each transformation meets established quality standards with real-time monitoring, automated gates, and intelligent remediation workflows.
svg.text: Code Evolution Quality Gates Checkpoint System
Systematic quality validation ensuring safe code transformation through automated gates and real-time monitoring
🔒 Five Quality Gates Workflow - Systematic Validation Pipeline
Each gate ensures specific quality criteria before proceeding to next transformation phase
Live monitoring with immediate feedback and automated remediation
Risk-based settings and mobile quality monitoring capabilities
• Basic gate management and threshold adjustment
• Cached validation rules with smart sync
• Local quality metrics storage and analysis
Seamless workflow integration with collaborative quality management and continuous learning
• Git workflow integration with quality gates
• IDE plugins for Claude Code optimization
Historical analysis and continuous improvement tracking with quantified outcomes
♿ WCAG 2.1 AA | Validation Status Announcements | Keyboard Navigation | Real-time Quality Updates
🔄 Complex Quality System: 5 gates active | 12 hours estimated complexity | Real-time validation without workflow blocking
